snippet.title: Archmage Rises - Steam Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience the freedom normally only found in a tabletop RPG. Empowered with magic, you will create your own story, and experience real consequences from the decisions you make. Will you be the world’s savior… or its destroyer? The choice is yours.

Archmage Rises is an open world procedurally generated mage simulator RPG game where you control a young mage rising to power, where your every decision could have far reaching consequences.

Coming April 24th to Early Access on Steam. Wishlist the game here (and help our small indie team out!): https://store.steampowered.com/app/506480/Archmage_Rises/

You can also jump in our Discord to talk about the game with fellow mages here: https://discord.gg/DUE2NYPrcQ
